headline: Pfizer's Rich Dividend Story Meets Overpriced Metsera Acquisition/Patent Cliff Risks
summary: Pfizer offers strong dividends, solid cash flow coverage, discounted value and key risks from patent cliffs, pricing and costly deals. See why PFE stock is a buy.

headline: A Look at BioNTech (NasdaqGS:BNTX) Valuation Following Pfizer’s Share Sale Announcement
summary: BioNTech (NasdaqGS:BNTX) shares caught investors’ attention after Pfizer revealed plans to sell its remaining stake in the company through an overnight block trade. This announcement prompted a wave of trading activity and market discussion. See our latest analysis for BioNTech. BioNTech’s share price has edged down nearly 2% this year, with momentum cooling further in recent months as investors weigh Pfizer’s exit and slowing Covid-19 vaccine revenues against a robust pivot back to oncology...
